entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 except minus 13 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9 except minus 13 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
